spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_M00_AXI_TARGET_SLAVE_BASE_ADDR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: C M00 AXI TARGET SLAVE BASE ADDR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: The master requires a target slave base address. // The master will initiate read and write transactions on the slave with base address specified here as a parameter.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_M00_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Width of M_AXI address bus. // The master generates the read and write addresses of width specified as C_M_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_M00_AXI_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Width of M_AXI data bus. // The master issues write data and accept read data where the width of the data bus is C_M_AXI_DATA_WIDTH

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_M00_AXI_TRANSACTIONS_NUM
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Transaction number is the number of write // and read transactions the master will perform as a part of this example memory test.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_M00_AXI_TARGET_SLAVE_BASE_ADDR
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: C M00 AXI TARGET SLAVE BASE ADDR
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: The master requires a target slave base address. // The master will initiate read and write transactions on the slave with base address specified here as a parameter.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_M00_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Width of M_AXI address bus. // The master generates the read and write addresses of width specified as C_M_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_M00_AXI_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Width of M_AXI data bus. // The master issues write data and accept read data where the width of the data bus is C_M_AXI_DATA_WIDTH

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_M00_AXI_TRANSACTIONS_NUM
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Transaction number is the number of write // and read transactions the master will perform as a part of this example memory test.
